Title: AN ACT CHANGING THE NAME OF THE TRADE SCHOOL OF THE PROVINCE OF BATANGAS TO "PABLO BORBON MEMORIAL SCHOOL," IN HONOR OF THE LATE PABLO BORBON, ONE OF THE OUTSTANDING SONS OF SAID PROVINCE.
Data:
[ Act No. 3835, November 06, 1931 ]
AN ACT CHANGING THE NAME OF THE TRADE SCHOOL OF THE PROVINCE OF BATANGAS TO "PABLO BORBON MEMORIAL SCHOOL," IN HONOR OF THE LATE PABLO BORBON, ONE OF THE OUTSTANDING SONS OF SAID PROVINCE.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The Trade School of the Province of Batangas shall hereafter be known as "Pablo Borbon Memorial School," in honor of the memory of the late Pablo Borbon, Representative and Governor of said province and Judge of the Court of First Instance.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, November 6, 1931.
